text: we have finished setting up our company invision account

<@U026PLK4S> <@U0260V1BX> <@U1172PRDX> <@U0XJFPSRL> <@U0260V4K1> <@U02AUNA0P>  Members on Enterprise who have paid personal subscriptions (Starter, Professional, or Team plans) can downgrade now to Free plans by following these easy steps. They'll still need their Free plan account to access the Enterprise environment. Learn more
 
There are now two login areas:
<https://projects.invisionapp.com/> (personal account)
<https://uncorkedstudios.invisionapp.com/> (Enterprise account) Please direct your team to bookmark and save this in the URL address bar of your browser as the primary point of entry.
 
If you'd like to transfer projects to your Enterprise account, project owners can do so by following these steps.
If you have a mass project transfer request, simply reply to this email with a list of the users and their projects (or send us a CSV). WeÂ’ll migrate the projects promptly.
For the rest of the team, I'll remove user accounts. If there are people who have had access to your projects, you might need to re-share (producers and developers, for instance)
Awesome! Thanks so much for all of this, Megan. (Especially dealing with sales guy!)
